original_title: 殺し屋・蘭 美しき処刑人
overview: A gangster organization, Miran, a brilliant female killer who was asked to kill three executives of the Ryutoragumi. After finishing her work, she decided to hide in Okinawa for a while at the request of the organization. One day, Miran, who enjoys Okinawa, meets Shinshiro, a man with a strange atmosphere at the sea. He had just come out of prison, half-killing his ex-wife and his lover who had abusively killed his child. Shinshiro confesses to Miran his plans to kill her ex-wives, saying, "Revenge isn't over." Miran, who has spared her spare time, decides to drive him to her ex-wife. Meanwhile, within the organization, a plot over Miran was secretly underway ...
tagline: Big breasts are alive! Starring Sasa Handa, the original small devil! A road movie of a killer and a translation ant man rampages in her hometown of Okinawa . The destination is ...
title: Assassin Ran - The Beautiful Executioner
